text:
First off I would like to say that I am well aware of the fact that I have it better off than probably most people who post here. I'm not trying to be entitled or anything. But it goes to show that even if you're given everything you need by your family you can still feel this way. My case in point.

I'm 19, and I still live with either my mom and stepdad or grandparents (I go between the two places). I was raised with everything I might need, and have lived a comfortable life. However, last September, I began to feel different. That was my first semester in college, and I really didn't like the major I was in. I wanted to get out of it, and so I did. After 2nd semester I officially changed my major to something maybe I might enjoy(?). But nonetheless, I still feel terrible.

That first semester my grades were subpar, at least for my standards. But I began to feel like I was never going to go anywhere. I couldn't see my future, and I still can't. I began to lose motivation to do anything, and now I barely even have the motivation/will to live. Yesterday was the first day I told anyone in my family, my mom, that I had very little will to live.

I was forced into doing so, but yesterday I applied for several jobs. I haven't had an official job before, just miscellaneous things I did for family members and got paid some cash for. My mom said it would somehow make me better. But hell, I don't even have the motivation to do that. I feel like I can't do something everyone else can; it's not that I don't feel I'm capable, but with my mental state I'm not sure I can. And because of this, I feel absolutely pathetic. I don't feel that forcing me to do something I have no will to do is going to make me feel any better. Just look at the fact I'm living-- well I guess no one is forcing me to live, but every day I feel worse and worse, because I almost don't want to anymore.

I knew this day was going to come, but I didn't think it would be so soon. I never really imagined being this close to wanting to end everything, at least not yet. Like I said before, I couldn't see my future, and so I imagined I probably wouldn't last long after I graduate. I wondered why I'm even going to school anyways if that's how it's gonna end.

I get chastised often by my mom for being on my PC all day or playing video games, but there's a reason for this. When I'm doing these things, I at least forget about my troubles and feel happy for once. But obviously I can't live like that forever, and I don't know what else I can do when that life comes to an end.

The only few reasons I continue to feel like living is because I want to continue being with my friends, and I love to watch new TV series or videos online, and read comics. But obviously I can't do that when I'm dead. But I guess when you're dead you don't really care. But in addition to this, I have just a very minuscule shard of hope that things will get better. But I fail to see this become more likely with each day. 

People might suggest therapy, counseling, or talking to a helpline; my mom told me when school starts back up, she'll help me get a counselor on campus. But what exactly are they going to do? I doubt they could do much, if anything. Just talking isn't going to help me, so I think that things like a helpline or counselor won't really help.

When I told my mom I didn't feel much will to live anymore, I absolutely burst into tears. I can't even remember the last time I'd done that, but I was being absolutely sincere when I said it. It was so hard for me to actually get it out of my mouth, too. My mom just said it was fear, but I don't think that's totally true. What I'm scared of isn't my future, but instead is the fact I can't see myself having one. I feel like I just am not ready for life. It's not like I chose to be born, no one was. But at this point, if I had known my life was gonna come to this point, I honestly don't think I would've chosen to be. 

I just can't think of anything that can help me. Again, every day I feel worse and worse. I know I said I have a few things that keep me feeling like I want to live, but eventually I think this feeling of not wanting to anymore will overcome those things. So, why do I even bother anymore?

Quick summary! I am only 21 y.o. but I have a lot going on! Intergenerational trauma on my mother's side of the family. Pure evil on the important (to my existence) father's side of the family - to the point where my father tried to kill my mother and me and he may have killed my dog. My mother is chronically ill. I have been more than half my life in poverty. The house she and I live in belongs legally to my father and only to him. I've studied a university degree that can only worsen my mental health. My life is an unfunny joke, I have self-hate, depression, cPTSD, chronic sleep insomnia, overall horrible health, terrible coping mechanisms, etc. I miss my dog so much. And so much stuff that is left out of the summary.


I have no agency in my life and today a close friend who knows this shamed me/ tried to persuade me not to kill myself. I mean??? I'm only human!!? There's people who can't handle one relatively minor thing such as being a virgin and I am supposed to carry all these baggage all my life?? Fuck you world, fuck you family, fuck my lack of help and agency.

text:
Recently my ex has come back up after breaking it off for about a year saying sorry about everything and says her grandparents (whom are racist dirtbags whom abused her in an incredible fashion that nearly sends me into a rage) said I spread her nudes and lied about evidence to split us up and get emotions overwhelm her and she believes them when she should believe me far more. Apon returning she barely talks to me, taking 10+ minutes at least 90% of the time to respond with me always being there person to start the conversation and recently my grandfather passed and it hit me pretty hard. She went to the viewing with me and we spent some time together afterwards and cheered each other up and some of our old love and chemistry showing itself when I asked for a hug in my car (I'm loving and very tactile) and it turned into a cuddle. Next came his ceremony where he got his honor gaurd and the last time we'd say goodbye before cremation and being put to rest with other soldiers and she couldn't come but we made plans the previous day that we'd spend time together and I texted her in the morning and on the way home from the ceremony with no answer, come about 8 at night she finally comes back up saying yeah let's go out but when I show up she isn't there and says she went out for fireworks. She knows I'm in extreme pain although not likely knowing that I'm toying with a knife thinking of it's blade piercing my neck in my car outside her house. She eventually tells me to go home because she has to talk to her housemates parents and we plan for tomorrow but she never responds a time even though its not even 9 yet. You can guess that tomorrow I get no response so at about 4 today I texted her accusing her off playing with me and similar stuff and her response is that she was helping her grandmother (that I was talking about earlier) plan her funeral, the day I was at my grandfather's funeral. Apparently she was doing that today as well even though she made plans with me AGAIN. The only fights we've had is because she listens to her grandparents and she lets her emotions get the best of her and this time it wasn't a misunderstanding, she accused me of not caring when she ignored me knowing I was in pain for two days and yet she never fills me in on anything doesn't talk to me or give any real effort. 

Thank you for reading this all the way through and while I'll probably ignore it I wouldn't mind someone putting in their two cents

text:
I think this is the worst day of my life. 
I watched all Dr K and Reckful videos about his depression and they gave me a lot of hope. He seemed fine in his latest videos, and said he was genuinely happy after lunching his game. Got the news of his suicide on 7am, just 1 hour and a half before my driving license exam, which I worked so hard to pass, and failed because I was so out of it. As they say, suicide is contagious and I'm making a big effort to not fuck it up.

I've been depressed for almost 2 years now and when I was close to taking the fast exist I went to the doctor because that seemed like the only other solution to the problem. (This was on February)
The doctor gave me an appointment with a psych 3 months later, so I waited patiently with that date in my mind to remain strong. Then corona happened and it was delayed another 3 more months, being the new date the 7th of July. Some relatives have talked very recently about their medical appointments being cancelled because of little corona infections happening again and I'm so terrified. I'm to o scared to call and ask if it has been canceled. I don't think I can do this until September alone.
I also have the university entrance exam on 6th of July (2 days left) and I haven't even started to study because I simply can't do it so I have probably already ruined my future.

I just need something to tie me here, an upvote, a comment, something to watch at 4 am high and drunk wanting it all to end. Please, I beg you.
I will post updates every two days at least

text:
I was considering putting this on r/offmychest but you tend to feel kinda bad putting your post next to the handful of posts filled with happy people who just so happened to get engaged during a freaking pandemic.

Life isn't really good atm. Not like 'virus is about, society is collapsing' bad, but like 'Life is soup, I am fork' bad. It's like if God decided Jesus' death wasn't enough and decided to hand select me to die on cross #2 for post-armageddon's sins. 

Yours truly was abused and bullied up until he was about 14 to 15 years old. I was considering jumping off an apartment when I was 14. Strawberry sauce at ground floor, yknow? I didn't really want to die just yet... I decided to make 'the choice'.

If u spray a field with DEET chemicals, insects in the field either die or adapt. Apparently being the unwanted insect that nobody wanted, I chose to adapt. Every day HURTS, but I still keep going yknow? I wanted friends, grades, happiness... And I worked hard at getting them. I fought hard to get my grades straight... Tried to make myself happy...

Then I realised... Not a lot of people like me. I live on a different plane of existence, where I can't mingle or talk with people without sacrificing who I truly am. When I try to change my attitude... my approach... they still don't stay.

When you're nice, they take your stuff and leave. When you're mean, they stay a little longer! But only so they can deliver the 'last say' if you catch my drift. 
When you stop saying anything and let them come to you, they don't come! And when you try a little too hard, you're annoying. I never really felt comfortable or significantly happy at all. 

I tried everything. I didn't care if I was worth it or not, I'm going to have a happy life regardless! No one's obligated to talk to me? Well, people talked to me anyways! 'Once you get friends, you're in the matrix!' Why I would love a large helping of blue pills, Mr mental health guru. 

This isn't it. I'm just so upset and sewer slidal (my phone autocorrected that I'm keeping it). I'm set for a happy-ish life but right now, I'm just a couple few barbequeues short of a smiley guy. 

Come to think of it, strawberry sauce seems like a pretty good option atm.

text:
I used to be so depressed that I fucking gave up on everything contemplated suicide in the sense that I wanted to kill myself because I found no interest in life, but also didn't want to kill myself because I didn't care enough about anything. 

There is one thing I've always cared about though, weakness, and one day I took a look at myself and I realised that for multiple reasons even aside from my depression I was pathetically weak and I hated it.

That was it, it's that hate that drove me forwards every single day to go outside of my comfort zone to be stronger. 

I am absolutely disgusted by my weakness. So much so, that I dont care how long it takes, or how much longer I have to stay here and work and struggle, I will one day eradicate all of my weakness. 

Hatred may be a strong poison, but it's an even stronger fuel.

text:
I‚Äôve been a long time sufferer of anxiety and depression. I‚Äôm at a point in my life now where I no longer fear death, in fact , I think about death/not existing and fantasize about it all the time. I see photos of before I was born and I can‚Äôt help but get so happy an nostalgic at a world where I didn‚Äôt exist. In conjunction with that, I constantly focus on ways to make my non-existence a reality. I hurt knowing I would leave my children behind, but the hurt and pain I feel about everything else is far worse and just not livable anymore. Im just tired of ‚Äúbeing‚Äù and ‚Äúexisting‚Äù. It‚Äôs exhausting. 

I had hopes of when I went into surgery a few months ago that I wouldn‚Äôt ever wake up again and I was so at peace with that. My doctors told me I was the calmest patient they ever saw before a surgery. Of course I was, I was so happy to be put under and escape this life in hopes I wouldn‚Äôt return. But here I am. 

I also fantasize about how much shit my coworkers talk of me... rationalizing even more how worthless I am and not deserving of the life I have. My family would be fine... this I do know. 

I had a close call a few days ago when a car coming the opposite direction crossed the yellow line and I have never felt more calm than in that moment. I was so ready. 

I‚Äôm chicken shit for being a pussy about how to kill myself... but I fantasize about how I would do it all the time. It consumes any spare time I have. I intentionally block times off to think and imagine a world where I don‚Äôt exist. 

I get so excited when I have the house to myself, too. I slam my head into the corners of the walls and will starve myself as punishment. It feels so good to do these things. 

I look forward to not existing. At least that is something that‚Äôs a given. It‚Äôs all I look forward to and fantasize about.

text:
I have considered suicide for a long time now, but this week was the limit.

This week my teacher told me I wasn‚Äôt going to graduate. As the only one of my class I had to stay at home and it hurt me so much when I saw pictures being shared on social media. They all seemed so happy and I was at home crying about what a failure I am. I seriously can‚Äôt do another year in school because it will mentally break me. I‚Äôd rather die than go to that school for another year. 

In the graduation pictures I saw A (I don‚Äôt want to use her name), a girl i‚Äôve been in love with for 2 years, but off course she doesn‚Äôt love me. Why would she? How can she love me if I can‚Äôt even love myself? We were so good friends but I ruined everything when I told her how I felt. I blame myself so much for ruining everything. The worst thing is that I feel so comforted by her, that now when I need it the most I can‚Äôt turn to her anymore. 

To be honest I haven‚Äôt felt happy in 3 years now and I don‚Äôt see any change any time soon. I just hate myself, I hate everything about me. I feel useless, unloved, ashamed of who I am and unwanted. I just wake up everyday wishing I would‚Äôve died in my sleep. I just want the suffering to end.

I also have been to psychologist for almost a year now. I think it‚Äôs the most useless thing to do because if I tell her I want to commit suicide they‚Äôll just put me in a mental hospital.

text:
I don‚Äôt really have anybody to talk to and I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôm in a bad enough place to call my therapist... so I‚Äôm here.

I‚Äôm 31 and have, for most of my life, felt like there is something wrong with me. While I am rather intelligent, I am very disorganized, struggle to focus or accomplish anything, and have no friends. Since childhood, I have tried to get help but have instead been hurt time and time again. 

At the age of 23 I feared I was transgender (despite being assigned female and wanting nothing more than to be a woman) and ended up in therapy with a psychologist who focused on gender. She understood my terror as internalized transphobia and pushed away every reason I had for not wanting to medically transition. I told her I wasn‚Äôt masculine and that thinking about starting testosterone provided me with no relief whatsoever, but therapy essentially became about me having to accept the horrible fact that I could not be a woman and would not be able to keep the body I had been blessed with. I proceeded to spend 5 years on testosterone and get a double mastectomy. It was terrible. [What I was dealing with is called transgender OCD; I never had gender dysphoria. I am a woman.]

It was only 2 years ago that I began to uncover all my memories of therapy with that woman and things came crashing down hard. I‚Äòd had to convince myself that I was too fucked up to have children and that I could not be in a romantic relationship because nothing about the reality I was living in made sense. Over those years, I couldn‚Äôt understand why I wasn‚Äôt allowed to be a woman but had to just accept it. But now here I am, having lost so many years of my life, my body and voice forever altered.

I am still completely without motivation, friends, etc. I have done so little in life and cannot even afford an apartment of my own. I have a job, but I‚Äôm doing a bad work there and do not enjoy it. On some level I have accepted that I will never have my body back, but it makes me sick every day to remember I specifically went to therapy because I didn‚Äôt want to have to transition. That therapist‚Äôs treatment of me will never make any sense to me. And to make it all worse, everything that was wrong with me as a child is still wrong with me, but it‚Äôs all much worse now that I have this extra trauma that consumes me.

I don‚Äôt think I was supposed to be born. When I was younger, I told my mom she should have aborted me (terrible, I know, but it speaks to a long held feeling). 

I regularly hope that I will die in my sleep but am coming to accept that I may have to end it myself. I don‚Äôt know how (and don‚Äôt want my roommate to have to find me) but it seems like the most rational thing to do. All I have learned from mental health treatment is that no one believes there‚Äôs anything that can be done for me. So many mental health professionals have tried to reframe my story and/or minimize various aspects of my struggle. But what I know is this: It‚Äôs not sustainable to live without connection. It feels horrible to be this smart but to have no motivation and be completely unable to accomplish anything. It hurts my heart watching everyone around me have babies and love when I know that even if somehow I found a partner, it would be cruel for me to try to be a parent. If I‚Äôm this messed up, a child of mine could really only be worse.

Anyway, maybe I‚Äôll off myself soon... but I still hope I‚Äôll get lucky and die suddenly and without pain. That would be a beautiful ending.

text:
I thought it was my impulsive mood swings that would drive me to the brink of suicide one day but I'm realizing right now, it's more of a slow walk.

Suicidal thoughts used to come and go as I would give in to my emotions good and bad. Now it's just always there.

When I'm happy, I'm sad because I know this won't last and the thing that is waiting for me will come sooner rather than later. 

When I'm sad, I no longer feel the full extent of the emotion. I'm almost numb, the blows keep coming, I just don't care anymore. I know where I'm headed.

It's the anger that gets me. I'm angry at everything and because I'm angry at everything I see sides of myself I wish I never would. It reaffirms that I shouldn't be here. If there's one good thing I can do, it's remove myself from this planet.

text:
So, two days ago the one friend in this world I knew I could be completely honest with and would never judge me died They were the one person I could could confide in that I had an LDR with a huge age gap but that person meant/means everything to me.  

I was also able to talk to them about the rape I experienced just over 4 months ago which despite the 'impossibility' (age/menopause) resulted in pregnancy.  Due to a heart condition (amongst other things) I am not expected to survive the birth but I cannot change the situation or deny this child the right to his or her life.  So, I had my friend tell my LDL that I was already dead.  I thought that way I could at least support him.  Of course I wasn't expecting things to work out the way they did  

R/7th all I can do is apologise.  There are no excuses.  I understand if you never want to speak again but please don't blame J or G for this.  It was all my doing.  If it helps at all I am in considerable physical as well as mental pain.   I know I caused you extra pain but that was never my intention

text:
Hi everyone. This might be a long post because I need to get it all out. TLDR at bottom

So I went to the ER because I was having intense suicidal thoughts. After maybe 7 hours they let me out of the ER because they said that they thought they could ‚Äútrust me‚Äù and gave me the number for an outpatient program. 

I got an appointment for intake (had to wait 4 days because they didn‚Äôt have anything earlier), but they wouldn‚Äôt let me in because I had a temperature of 98.8. They told me I could reschedule for two weeks later. I told them that I was having serious mental health issues and I couldn‚Äôt wait that long. 

After I said that, a women pulled me to a private room and asked if I was planning to kill myself. She seemed angry (like she was really busy and didn‚Äôt have time to deal with this). 

I told her that‚Äôs why I was here: that yes, I do have a plan and a method to kill myself, but that I just want to try getting help one last time before I go through with it. She then actually started yelling at me. She told me that if I couldn‚Äôt tell her I wouldn‚Äôt kill myself they would have to ‚Äúthrow me in a random psych ward. I don‚Äôt know where or even which one.‚Äù 
I know you are probably thinking I‚Äôm exaggerating that. But that is actually what she said and I could not believe she would phrase it like that. She continued to describe how terrifying the experience of being hospitalized would be for me and that I wouldn‚Äôt be able to leave. But if I could just say that I wouldn‚Äôt hurt myself I could go home instead.

I stuck to my guns and told her that I am having intense and intrusive suicidal thoughts, and that I really don‚Äôt have a yes or no answer for if I would kill myself. I told her I might be able to promise I could be safe for the next few hours, but I can‚Äôt predict how I would feel later, especially if that‚Äôs for 2 weeks. She continued to pressure me and I told her I would call 911 if it got ‚Äúreally bad‚Äù. That seemed good enough for her and she made me sign a contract that basically said someone couldn‚Äôt sue them if I killed myself. And then they told me to leave.

Later that day I got a call that said that if I got a negative covid test I could come back for an intake appointment before the two weeks were up. And that they would fit me in the same day I got the test back. I got the test. No covid. Called to tell them that and they said I wouldn‚Äôt have to wait ANOTHER 4 days for intake, even though they promised they would have me in that day. I came back after that and had a temperature of 99.2, but they just shrugged it off. I finished the intake and they told me to start the program the next day.

So far I‚Äôve only been in their partial hospitalization program for 4 days and it‚Äôs awful. 

Every day, at the end of the day, they ask us if we are going to be safe. For the first 3 days I gave them my honest answer: I don‚Äôt know. They would then have a nurse pull me into another room and do a whole routine similar to the one I mentioned earlier. They would describe how scary the hospitalization would be. They would tell me I would have to share a room with people that have mental health issues, that they would be too loud and scary for me to sleep. They basically said anything to scare me away from saying I need to be there. And I would always just tell them I would call 911 if things got worse, and they‚Äôd let me go. 

I think they shouldn‚Äôt be approaching it like this. If they make it their mission to scare people out of hospitalization, some day someone is going to go home without the help they really need and kill themselves. It‚Äôs probably already happened. 

Since my very first day, I‚Äôve also felt harassed by a male patient who have been following me, asking me out, blocking the entrance/exit so I have to talk to him, etc. I complained to the staff that it makes it hard for me to feel safe there and they said that my only option was to put up with it or leave. Not the man. Me. 

I spoke to another girl in the program about this and she said he was doing the same thing to her. I later found out this was happening to every young skinny white girl that entered the program. Someone told me it‚Äôs happened to like 8 women. They have all complained about it but the management won‚Äôt do anything. He even tried to get in her car with one of these girls. It is also on our entrance contract that you can‚Äôt ask for other patient‚Äôs numbers and he‚Äôs done that several times. I feel like under those grounds they should be able to ask him to leave or at least behave himself but they didn‚Äôt do anything.

As for my therapy group itself, I don‚Äôt know if what we are doing is therapy. I‚Äôve tried to talk about some of the issues that brought me there but our group leader just doesn‚Äôt seem interested, talks over me, and changes the topic. In the past 4 days we‚Äôve spent 12 hours talking about his favorite movies, child actors that grow up and go on coke binges, and when he thinks is the appropriate time to use the n-word. I‚Äôm not joking. He spent an hour talking about just the n-word.

The program is just giving people 9 days in php before downgrading them to the 3-days-a-week 3-hours-a-day program. So far I haven‚Äôt been able to discuss anything that brought me there and I‚Äôm already half way through my stay. Yesterday I had a panic attack about that because I realized at this rate I would be discharged without even beginning to get help. If the next 5 days were anything like the first 4, I wouldn‚Äôt have received any therapy or learned any useful skills.

I went to the front desk and asked if I could speak to someone about rearranging my care plan. They asked me who I wanted to talk to and I told them whoever is in charge. Instead, they just got a random nurse.

The nurse did the whole suicide routine with me again and then handed me off to my psychiatrist. Before I could even say why I felt like I wasn‚Äôt getting any therapy, he told me I needed to just listen to him and that I wouldn‚Äôt like what he had to say.

He asked me if diabetes is curable. I said, ‚Äúno, but it‚Äôs managed.‚Äù He asked me if AIDS is curable. ‚ÄúNo but it‚Äôs managed‚Äù

He then said ‚Äúwell then why do you expect us to cure your depression? Because we can‚Äôt.‚Äù

At this point, no one had even asked me why I was unhappy with my care. No one asked me anything. I wanted to tell him that I didn‚Äôt expect my depression to be cured, but that I do expect at least some help to even start to manage it before I leave, but he called a nurse in to take me away before I could say anything to him.

The nurse took me to another room. I told her that I feel like I‚Äôm not getting any help here. She asked if I didn‚Äôt like my group therapist. I told her yes and started to tell her that I don‚Äôt feel listened to and she cut me off (ironic). She told me that I can‚Äôt say that ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt feel like I‚Äôm getting any help‚Äù and that I have to say ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt feel like I‚Äôm relating to (insert therapist name here)‚Äù. 

Which isn‚Äôt how I feel. I feel like I‚Äôm not getting any help, like I said. And I feel like I‚Äôm not being listened to, and your not listening to me.

She said ‚Äúwhat do you want? A female therapist?‚Äù

I told her ‚ÄúI guess?‚Äù because I do want a new therapist. Period. But him being a guy wasn‚Äôt the issue. Nobody had heard or wanted to hear the issue. 

I guess she just needed to check a box on a form because I was switching therapists. And if the reasons was something like the gender it would be less work because she wouldn‚Äôt have to listen to me and write it down. And that way the therapist wouldn‚Äôt get in trouble for talking about the n-word and how he thought Jodie Foster was hot in Taxi Driver for 4 days instead of doing therapy.  Gender was not the issue. The not doing any therapy part was the issue but I was so steamrolled over that nobody got to hear that.

The nurse than told me she couldn‚Äôt find anyone available and sent me to lunch, where I just sat in the parking lot for an hour feeling even more hopeless about this program than ever. When I came back the nurse said she could squeeze me into another group next week. Which I guess is good, but at this point I have lost so much faith in the rest of the program that I don‚Äôt know if I want to come back. 

At the end of the day, the group leader I‚Äôm supposed to have next week was the one who had to ask again if we would be safe. I was so emotionally exhausted that I thought if I opened my mouth I would cry. When she got to me she asked me if I wanted to pass and I nodded. She said I still needed to answer if I would be safe. I didn‚Äôt have it in me to speak so I just nodded again. She said I had to verbally say I would be safe (I guess for legal reasons). I said it and immediately burst into tears like I knew I would, in front of everyone.

I thought she might ask me if something was wrong and if I was actually safe after she let the group out. Because if you ask someone if they are going to hurt themselves and they burst into tears and can hardly choke out a few words saying they‚Äôll be ok maybe you should talk with them. But no. She just let me go anyways.

I am so hopeless about going back. My first week got me absolutely nowhere. The only thing that has changed is that I feel like no one at this hospital has any concern for my safety of any desire to hear how I feel.

I want to quit the program because I am just being made to feel uncomfortable and unimportant. I haven‚Äôt gotten any therapy while there but I‚Äôm also scared about what I would do if I‚Äôm not in a program at all.



TLDR: PHP program hasn‚Äôt been providing me with therapy, threatens me out of saying I‚Äôm suicidal, and allows harassment

text: I can't get better living with my family. I'm too depressed to get another job on top of the one I have. I don't function. I daydream the whole day and sh to cope. I'm tired of being alive. I've been on almost every medication available for my mental illnesses and not a single one has worked long term. I'm tired of the hallucinations and the bad thoughts. Every second I'm awake I want to hurt myself. Even in my dreams I'm hurting myself and trying to die. Im too depressed to cope and I've tried to reach out for help , even with professionals, but they never pay attention. I'll try to talk to my counselor about it on Tuesday and see if I can get admitted to the local mental hospital to be assessed to see if I'm eligible to be put in the state mental hospital. If this doesn't work out my only option is to continue trying to kms until it works. Or I might kill myself tonight or during the weekend.

text: I've been struggling with this dark thoughts for a s ping as I can remember but I can say firmly after today, and as I write this, I'm ready to end everything, I've tried so hard to stay strong and I can do any more, I'm in so much emotional pain everyday, the facade I put on is fading, I just feel I cant go to anyone, without bringing them down with me. I waant to be happy, and want ro the person everyone deserves but I cant. I'm kidding myself by thinking I can be. I just want the pain to stop, I just want to stop feeling the way I do. I hate this. I'm sick of the voices in my head, telling me to end it, I just want it all to stop. It pains me to write this but reliving at the same time. My feelings are not just trapped in my own head all the time. But I want to leave and make sure no blames themselves, this is something that I alone have decided. It's the pain has become too much to shrug off and ignore anymore. I know this isnt the place for this sort of thing and I'm sorry I just...I dont know what to do I have no one to talk to, and no where to go. I'm just so sorry for everything

text: This is my second post on here and I just wanted to let it out somewhere because I don't try have anyone close enough I can talk to (and would rather stay anonymous). Today I talked to a friend (earlier i was originally just having a walk to a place that made me feel a bit weird and I thought that maybe I could try and talk to someone for once to see if it could help distract me from my bad thoughts) I haven't talked to in a little while, I thought that maybe I'd feel a bit better after feeling a bit bad for a while. I've been thinking about this for a while. I finally feel like I'm wanted or at least there for people. I want to support people on their way to success, but I don't know about mine. Knowing that someday I will be truly left alone scares me. I'd rather be with someone who I can talk to face to face rather than through a damn phone too.

Only now do I feel somewhat wanted by everyone around me.

They say we're going to be movie stars, hall of famers, all of those things... We're all going to be a success...

I find it hard to believe.

Sacrifice for the greater good of humanity and those around me is what I believe in even if it costs my own life to protect it.

text: Every time I try to talk to someone about this all they can ever say is that I'm choosing to be like this. The thing is, they're right. I hate myself, really badly. Every time I walk past the mirror I feel the urge to swing at myself and half the time I dont even try to fight it. All I ever do is sit around and wallow in self pity and all it does recognizing that fact is make me even more aware of how terrible I am. My anxiety controls my life completely and I dont even have the energy to resist it anymore. I want out of this, desperately. I'd take suicide in a heartbeat but I'm too scared of the pain to even do that. I'm not even afraid of dying anymore, it just seems peaceful. I just cant work up the nerve to make myself do it. I'm so god damn tired of being alone and i cant even come close to finding someone like this and if i did all I'd do is make their life worse. By all means this should just be a choice. Just go to therapy, right? Stick to your job, work out, find a good schedule, work yourself out of it? I've done it in the past, people way worse off do it all the time. But I dont think I even want to anymore. Every time I pull myself out, no matter how hard I try, no matter what I do, I get drug back down again sooner or later and it's always my fault. I dont have the willpower to spend my whole life fighting this. I dont deserve to live, I'm pathetic, and weak, and selfish, and a terrible person. This post is just more proof, all im doing is pretending to reach out so I can shut down every Suggestion anyone has and use it to feel even worse for myself and try to garner some scrap of pity from well meaning people I've never met and who cant do a damned thing to help me. Cause it's all on me, it always has been and it always will be. It's entirely my choice to be this way, and I continue to get worse and worse and worse every day. I've always been a fairly militant athiest, but I find myself wanting to pray lately, beg some god or force in the universe to look down on me with pity and just snuff me out. I dont know why I'm even taking the time and effort to write this post.

text:
My wife and I just got married. She came from the Philippines for the sole purpose of marrying me.

Got married in January. Been questioning a lot since then. Including my will to live.

We have been fighting more and more. She expresses how badly she wish she could go back to the Philippines. 

I want her to go. I don't want her to be bogged down here because of me. And divorce is unheard of in her family. 

She doesn't want to leave me though. 

So as a just in case basis I wrote down my suicide note on my phone. Should I need to then I will do a quick copy-paste and then blast my noggin off. Thats the plan as of this moment. 

I know I can't go on like this for much longer.... we have the works going just in case we can save everything, counseling, etc. But just in case, if worse comes to worse, I'm ready now to leave on a moments notice.

Even thinking of doing it now. I thought as she hugged me before she took a nap, if this is the last hug she ever got from me...

text:
Here I am back where I desperately try so hard to stay away from. I‚Äôve had depression my whole life I think but since I‚Äôve reached my early 20s it‚Äôs gotten completely out of hand. Constant fear , anxiety , depression, intrusive thoughts, ptsd . I‚Äôm exhausted and tired of hating myself. 

Here is what is going on with me right now. I date this girl who i became friends with in college . We dated for about a year and it ended when she sent nudes of herself to another man. She told me one evening when I was over her place laying in bed . I ended it the next day. I was pretty hurt by what she did , especially because she was the last person I would suspect to ever betray me like that. For about a month after the break up she kept trying to get me back . Trying to figure out ways to work on it. But I kept insisting that the trust was broken. I can forgive her and move on from what she did but I can‚Äôt trust her anymore . She wouldn‚Äôt take no for an answer.

Another month passes and she stops hitting me up. It got to the point where I had to completely block her on everything but she figured out a way to make a temporary number to reach out to me. After another month passes she starts hitting me up again only singing a different tune basically saying I‚Äôm a piece of shit I did nothing for her in the relationship and how I can‚Äôt forgive her for this one mistake but she can forgive me for a million. She would still try calling me at night and would randomly send me angry texts yelling at me for something she didn‚Äôt like that I did . Basically every time she tried texting me it was to remind me that I‚Äôm a coward who was bad in bed never did shit for her and had no motivation to do anything with my life.

During the relationship I struggled with depression . I was afraid to go to therapy and I hated myself and had extremely low self esteem . I had erectile dysfunction so sex gave me anxiety. My girlfriend had a very high sex drive and she always wanted to have sex and complained and made me feel bad for not wanting to enough and thought I wasn‚Äôt attracted to her . She made me feel like a loser and even yelled at me once and suggested an open relationship because I lost my erection during sex. 

She has bi-polar disorder and she would snap on me for any little thing I did. If I wasn‚Äôt getting something done quick enough, if I dropped a bag of chips going to a party. If I canceled plans. She would literally snap on me and constantly threaten to dump me. It wasn‚Äôt her fault though because she had that disorder but I couldn‚Äôt take the constant what I felt was bullying and when she would start an argument sometimes I would freak out and yell back because I didn‚Äôt know how to handle it. 

These fights would sometimes escalate into really bad screaming matches and we would both say really mean things to each other. But I swear from the bottom of my heart she would start about 95% of them because nothing I did was ever good enough for her everything was a problem to her. She picked on me and it was embarrassing. 

But we loved each other. She did a lot of things for me when she wasn‚Äôt being a jerk. She drove everywhere , tried helping me find a job when I was looking to quit my old one. Would babysit my neice ... and was a shoulder to cry on when I was going through serious problems with my depression. text:
Hey I‚Äôm not sure if this is the right place to post but I can‚Äôt talk to anyone I know about this. So Wednesday night at about between the hours of 9 and 10. I consumed an almost 3 month supply of my blood pressure medicine, (lisinopril 40mg). 

I‚Äôve done this before but back then I was only getting a months supply at a time and I ended up sending out messages to my family and wound up in the er. This time however I just drank until I fell asleep. I did this on impulse, I wasn‚Äôt planning it up until like 1 or 2 hours before I did it. 

Well I woke up around 6 am shaking in a cold sweat. I could hardly walk but I made it to the bathroom to puke my guts out. It was a rough day but I managed to call in sick work (which I never do) and convince my wife that it was just alcohol withdrawal.
Anyway I looked up the half-life and it‚Äôs 12 hours. It‚Äôs been close to 48 hours and I‚Äôm still here. I don‚Äôt feel suicidal anymore but I don‚Äôt want this to happen again because it‚Äôll just keep escalating until it works. Seeing a therapist has never helped me. I‚Äôve worked in the mental health field and it always surprised me how people listened to me just because of my position.
Sorry this has gone on to long but thank you for reading this and caring. If nothing else the catharsis has helped me.

text:
# Let me tell you about my family a little before we get started

My great-grandfather was very rich that my family literally owned a small town in Izmir until they sold most of it because they are spending way too much money for their own \*entertainment\*.

My aunt is married to a millionaire (maybe billionaire? idk his net worth) business man who owns an international construction company along with many other smaller companies in different industries, his company primarily works for middle-eastern governments including Turkey's.

That same aunt apparently (I was told by my father) has connections to *extraordinarily* important and rich government officials also. (won't get into details for obvious reasons)

My family also has connections to politicians from both major parties in this country, one of which helped me get appointment from one of the best doctors for my OCD treatment (of course we couldn't afford it after like 3 sessions and I'm currently not getting medical help) after months of seeing a doctor who clearly does not know what he is doing.

All my cousins are well-educated and living in first-world countries such as Canada, United States and some EU countries.

# About me

I'm a 20 years old male from a very poor part of Turkey, a shitty middle-east country.

I grew up poor, didn't get any proper education (public schools in this country is, well, you get the picture) and learned everything I know by myself without any help.

I currently live with my mom and dad at a poor and dangerous neighborhood (people would literally stab you for looking at their eyes here!), needless to say we have no money and I'm living in pretty bad conditions.

For the last 6 years I have only had one single goal in my life: moving to a good country with my mom, preferably Canada. I'm rapidly losing my hopes of moving as our financial situation only gets worse and worse.

No one in my family cares about me, no one ever did. They almost deny my existence as they wouldn't even recognize me if I was standing right next to them in a bus stop. I was always a disappointment to them ever since I was born, all because my grandmother didn't want my father to marry my mom.

I never had any friends except one from middle school (whom I lost contact with 8 years ago). I never lived my childhood and teenage years and I'm likely to sit my 20s in this old, cheap chair looking at this computer screen. In the last 7 years of my live I learned programming and I made various different websites/apps/games with hopes I'd earn enough money to actually be able to live. No, all I got sums to around $5K. I can't even use my programming skills for my own projects anymore as I will no longer be able to afford paying for server costs due to Turkish Lira rapidly losing value against the United States Dollar and our only income is in TL.

I don't believe in any god or a supernatural entity, death is like time travel to me, I believe that once I'm dead trillions of years might pass and to me it wouldn't be anything. I would stay as nothing until whatever is me becomes something conscious again.

I have planned to end my life in many ways over the last decade, countless times. I planned every single detail very carefully to make sure nothing goes wrong. I even planned to leave a video note behind me for those who left me to rot in this shithole like they would even bother watching it.

All these scenarios and I can't possibly think of one single future where I survive after my mom and dog dies. I would kill myself without even thinking twice.

TL;DR: My family is basically among the super-elite of Turkey, they did everything they could to make my life worse and worse despite having the power to help me, all because my grandmother didn't like my mother.

text:
I'm 22, i left school when i was 15 and from that point i've been on a downward spiral with multiple depressed phases. Lots of suicidal thoughts, my mind is so clouded i can barely think anymore and im so fucking tired all the time. 

For years i've spent the majority of my time either working out and trying to get better or lying down in bed every day watching pointless shit sinking endless hours into watching braindead content on youtube/twitch/reddit or gaming or masturbaiting

I'm embarrassed to be alive, i hate that my family have to even talk to me... I've become fucking ugly, i have body dysmorphia and ADD. I have pushed all my family and friends away who try to help i'd rather just stay like this... A retarded recluse who feels so disgusting that i can barely look at myself.

The embarrassment and emotional pain i feel on a daily basis is completely fucked, i have nothing left. I socially isolate so nobody can talk to me, i ignore all the calls i get, i start waking up at night instead of day so i don't have to see my family. Im so tired i can barely stand for long periods of time, i'm fucking 22 and a 6'2 male who was in pretty good shape 6 months ago.... What the fuck i can't even believe how stupid i am. And these cycles have been going on for fucking yeaaars man, i've never felt fucking comfortable in my own skin i swear.

My posture has gone to shit, my general hygiene has gone to shit, i don't care about my health even though i'm obsessed with how i look, i don't try to change it. I feel unattractive but deep down all i've ever wanted is someone to hold

I enjoy sleeping rather than being awake, running from my problems, being inconsistent with every facet of life, always taking myself for granted

Im so confused because i'm a spiritual person yet so vain and insecure, it's tearing me apart i don't understand and i'm detaching myself from "reality" or whatever the fuck that is.

I'm planning on getting drunk and hanging myself tomorrow, putting a rope around my neck and kicking the ladder. Tying a perfect noose and having a solid anchor point, im scared but its the only thing that comforts me.

Going to play some music, buy some cigarettes and drink

My mother loves me so much but she cant see this, i cant tell her

I understand that even posting this is seen as an outcry for help, but i'm not doing this for me. I just want to leave some sort of miniscule mark for someone to perceive which sounds dumb. But this has been my life... Me holding a fucking phone in my hands lying down in bed (like usual). 

Goodbye

Mother, the face of the woman I feel I should love, but all I can think is all the times you'd make me take a belt or a shoe to the ass after a shower, still dripping wet, or the times you've hit me so hard in the morning that I'd walk to school with bruises across my arms, legs, face, and torso, of course that was apparently normal, so nobody spoke up about it. Mother, the woman who would yell at me saying shed still whoop my ass even though I was taller and bigger than her, and she stayed true to her word. Mother, the woman who'd go on a rampage for seeing a crumb on the ground when I had been constantly cleaning. Mother, the woman who put me through hell when I was on my period and made the world stop and focus on her when she had hers. Mother, the woman who'd lie to her family to cover up the fact that i hadn't eaten all day and yell at me for it. Mother, the woman who threatened to chop up my cat. Mother, the woman who shoves it in my face that she's getting rid of my cat, when she knows that my cat is my only emotional support. Mother, that woman I'm supposed to come to for everything, but I'm too scared to so I run to my dad but she yells at me for going to him. Mother, the woman who yells at me for not responding her yelling at me, yet yells at me for being a "smartass" when I do respond. Mother, who says I'm talking back when I finally stand up for myself once in a blue moon. Mother, the one who wants a baby when she doesn't even like the two kids she does have and complains about money problems and the pets. Mother, the woman who turns my family against me by making me the bad guy. Mother, the woman who I doubt will care when I'm dead. Mother, the woman who'll move on in a week, have a new baby, get rid of my cat, sell all my stories, songs, art. Mother, the woman i thought would've cared.

i miss you

text:
‚ÄúI‚Äôm a junkie, 23 years old with no friend, no job, no car, living alone in a foreign country with my grandma‚Äôs money.‚Äù

When I was born, my mom passed aways and my dad left me with my aunt and grandma. Grandma did a fine job taking care of me. However, my aunt would always hurt me, if not with her hands then her words. One time she locked me in the closet for days with out food or water, yelling ‚Äúeven your dad doesn‚Äôt want you, you shouldn‚Äôt be born.‚Äù It hurts so much but I get used to it.

As expected, growing up in abusive household took a toll on me. I became a troubled student as soon as I joined middle school. It started with little thing like fighting, smoking cigarettes, stealing other student‚Äôs stuff, one time I punched a teacher.

They had enough of me, my grandma and my aunt couldn‚Äôt handle me anymore so they sent me back to live with my dad. Btw, my dad started a new family so now I have step mom and step sister. 

After moving to new city, new school, new family, I felt lost. They all made me felt like I don‚Äôt belong in that family, that I‚Äôll aways be a mistake, that I don‚Äôt belong anywhere. I had no one to talk to, no one to ask for help, so I hid my problems, buried it deep down so it doesn‚Äôt hurt. 

I wanted to be recognized by my dad so I did everything to make him proud. I wasn‚Äôt bad at high school, as I always landed in top 5 of my grade. But that wasn‚Äôt enough. He never said he loves me or proud of me, hell he never act like it to. 

I started playing instruments, guitar, and piano. I joined the competitive martial art group and even got to the semi final match of my city. I ran for a school presidency, I got scholarship for top 4 university in Thailand, doing all that hoping to that he‚Äôd finally approve me as his son. Nope, ain‚Äôt got time for non of that. 

Ok I get it, I was a mistake. It doesn‚Äôt matter how hard I tried, he‚Äôll never be proud of me, so I gave up.

This happens when I was 18. I tried to kill myself.

My roommate came back and see me on the floor, throwing up, shaking, stuffs coming out of my mouth. I‚Äôd been hospitalized and diagnosed with clinical depression, panic attack, bipolar so they prescribed me bars and some other antidepressants. I stayed in hospital alone for days, hoping someone in my family would at least call or come to visit me, none. 

This finally hits me that I‚Äôm and I‚Äôll always be a mistake. So I ran aways, I came to the United States as college student. 

After a few months, instead of study hard working for better future, I started taking more prescribed pills, smoking weed, doing stuffs I‚Äôd never imaged before. Gambling aways my time and money. It felt good I‚Äôll tell you that, there‚Äôs not a thing in world you have to care when you get that dopamine ride. 

But what come up must goes down. After 2 years alone in US I tried to end it all again but I‚Äôm a coward and I couldn‚Äôt do it. I just couldn‚Äôt jump. I called suicide prevention line and they took me in for a few days.

After I was discharged I went back to be an addict full time. Gambling, smoking dope, popping pills.

Days turn to months, months turn to years and I stuck in the same loop. Waking up, get high, go to sleep. Repeat it over and over again. I don‚Äôt eat anymore because if I buy food then I don‚Äôt have money to pay for rent. 

It been 5 years now since I left the place I called ‚Äòhome‚Äô and I‚Äôm still the same person when I left, a loner, a failure, a mistake, plus hella addictions. 

I want it all to end. I feel shameful and guilt every time I look in a mirror, I hate seeing myself.

Everyone said get a job and life will be better... but who‚Äôd want a broken person like me? I can‚Äôt even work legally here.

I‚Äôve been sober for 4 months now. Everyday is a living hell for me. I have no purpose, no more self esteem.

I‚Äôm 23 and I‚Äôve tried to kill myself twice.
I just hope next time will be the last. 

(English is not my first language, I apologize for a mistake.)

text:
I've already written this here about a week ago in the comments of my other post, but I want to write it again.

Sometimes when I write about my family situation, I word it in a way that makes other people think that I live with an abussive mother. And this makes me feel very bad, because this is just not true. My mom actually has kicked my abussive step-dad from our house 6 years ago, which helped me a lot. And she have spent a lot of time and money trying to provide me a proper education and professional mental help. But this just didn't worked.

I've attempted to study in the university 3 times, but every time I failed in the first half-year because of my mental health getting worse and worse. Medical treatment had no positive effect at all. And I had very negative experience with so many therapists, I just don't trust any of them anymore.

My mom is not abussive - I'm actually the one who is abusing her. I often loudly yell at her for stupid reasons, because my sick brain precepts a lot of harmless things as an acts of hostility, and making me act very defensive. And even thought I always apologize to her about an hour after, this really poisons my mom's life (because, obviously, just  saying sorry and hugging will to heal the damage that have already been done).

She often tells me that one day I will drive her to stroke, and that she really wants to finally escape from me, and live with her BF in another county (and she already  has a serious plans to do this, but Coronavirus messed everything up). And this is really understandable - I yell at her very loud and often  also prefer all sorts of mental gymnastics to accuse her at even more insane things. And this hurts her so much, that she tells me that if I will continue she will call an ambulance that will drove me to a mental asylum (even though this is abviously not true - she loves me, and will never do that to me).

Don't think that she wants to leave me starving though (like I paranoidly say to her  sometimes) - she says that she will still financially support me, even from another country. But she really wants me to be able to live alone, without her constant help. I say to her that I can't work, but I think it's a lie (more to myself, that to her). Like she says, I still have my hands and legs, and don't have anything serious (like schizophrenia), so I can have at least a basic job to sustain my life - I'm just too lazy to do so, while other people with my exact issues can live alone fine.

Basically, I'm leeching on my mom. And the fact that with all of this I'm also (most likely intentionaly) wording my posts they way that make **her** look like and abuser, really makes me hate myself.

text:
No one truly cares about you until you're gone... This has been a universal truth since the beginning of man. No one wants to acknowledge your mental illness or need for support even though you're clearly signaling for help, instead most will ridicule you and treat your call for help as a cry for attention because they lack the empathy and intelligence to understand and perceive the world as through your perspective.

Once it's too late some will show their condolences and craft fake statements in an attempt to convince themselves that they really cared about you, all to validate themselves as "good people". These people never once had you cross their mind during their days until you passed, but as soon as you die you all of a sudden meant so much to them, and that you were such a huge inspiration to them.  


R.I.P By.ron

text:
I dont know anymore.. 

I dont know if I dont care at all, or if I care too much. 

I dont know why Im hurting so much. 

I dont know what to do against it, how to ease the pain without giving it over to others. 

And Im afraid. Im so fucking afraid. 

Im afraid that Ill always feel this way, that it never gets better, because truth be told, my life couldnt be much better. I have great friends and family, a job I love that pays well, my own awesome flat, a therapist, hobbies and interests, I got it all...

Im afraid one day I dont have the strength to carry on anymore. That one day I lose my battle, because I can win everyday and have to fight the next, but if I lose once, its over. 

Im afraid to let people in, because I fear I will hurt them eventually. Im afraid of what it will do to my mother, my brother, my sister, my friends. 

And most of all Im afraid this day is today...

Before you ask what happened; Nothing did. Its as good and bad a day as any other, thats the scary thing. There is no reason, no trigger, no problem to fix, nothing happened.

text:
Hi, sorry I don‚Äôt really know how to start.

In September of 2017, I was called into school to discuss with a counsellor why my attendance had been worsening, my mother had to come with me too. We arrived at the school, went through the office and into a room with a counsellor.

We sat down, and he was asking me and my
Mother questions, I don‚Äôt remember what they were but seeing as the meeting was being held to discuss attendance, I‚Äôm sure you can imagine what he wanted to talk about. All I really remember about the meeting is when he asked, ‚Äúare you willing to go into school now?‚Äù, because this was at about 10am on a school day. I replied with ‚Äúno, could I start fresh tomorrow?‚Äù. He said ‚Äúok, make sure you turn up though.‚Äù But in that moment I was completely aware that that was it for me.

In that moment, when I said no. That was it, I didn‚Äôt come in the next day, or the day after, I never went in again. Having being told all my life by my teachers that I had great potential, coming to realise that I had completely failed academically, because of my stupid fucking mental health. It haunts me everyday that moment.

Since then, I‚Äôve bounced around various mental health services who have tried to help me, all of which require me to leave my home. Which I can‚Äôt do anymore. I‚Äôm petrified of strangers, god forbid one laughs within a one mile radius of me, I‚Äôll think that they‚Äôre laughing at me cause I look like a disgusting goblin.

As I said all the help I was offered was dependant on me leaving my home, which I was unable to do, and I still am unable to do. I don‚Äôt know what to do. I can‚Äôt leave my home, my mind is foggy, I‚Äôm forgetting how to feel anything other than despair. I watch everyone I went to school with surpass me in every way imaginable. I‚Äôm stuck. I don‚Äôt want to live. I have no one to talk too, my mother is too old fashioned to understand what I feel. 

Everyday I wake up, go to my computer and sit at it everyday. I‚Äôm a leech, completely fucking useless, a complete and utter burden on everyone, even on my self. Why the fuck did I have to be born, why couldn‚Äôt someone more appreciative be born in my place. 

These are my current diagnoses, figured they should be included.

.Social Anxiety Disorder
.Major Depressive Disorder
.Borderline Personality Disorder

If you wasted your time reading my ramblings I‚Äôm sorry, I just, wanted to get something out there, maybe someone would read it and understand. Surely, just one.

text:
I feel like every decision I take is the wrong decision. I feel like my world has been crumbling around me slowly and I‚Äôm just tired of worrying and stressing. My family is in the lower class and we‚Äôve always struggled. I slept on the floor until I got my first bed when I was 10. I know people have been worse but that‚Äôs just kinda putting it into a perspective. I can‚Äôt help but feel like even when I‚Äôve got it good, right around the corner is something waiting to ruin my happiness. Right now I‚Äôm in the middle though, I just got a new job so I‚Äôm finally able to feel like I‚Äôm worth something but I just keep worrying about the worst like I‚Äôm going to get fired or something. The other day while I was working someone really sketchy walked in and for a second I was actually scared. Then just 5 seconds later my brain took a tole to who cares if I die. If I get shot and die it‚Äôs whatever. Just a very passive suicide kind of mindset. I don‚Äôt want to get into the problems of my life but today has been a terrible day and today just seems like a good day to say fuck it. I guess in the end I just feel like I‚Äôm walking on thin ice and like at any moment I‚Äôll be some bum on the streets all alone. I feel like I have no backup and like if I ever fell no one would be there to back me up. I kinda feel alone. I‚Äôm not alone, but I feel alone. Life is a series of random events, but I feel like the bad out weighs the good. I‚Äôm just tired of stressing out and worrying. The sad part is I‚Äôm only 18 so I know there‚Äôs plenty more of that coming my way. I just feel trapped and doomed to fail. 

Sorry for this depressing lump of text and to anyone who reads it.

text: Today I thought I'd text a mental health hotline and got nothing but automated responses. I'm tired of it, I'm tired of everything. Everyone around me has something or someone that makes them special, happy. I have nothing, no talents, no hobbies, and the only significant other I ever had abused me mentally. I would never consider good with women, even if I've had a few exes. Too bad all of them either treated me like shit or I rushed everything and made a fool out of myself. I'm stuck working a shitty part time job until I have to leave all of my friends and loved ones in August. In the meantime I get to hold back from putting a belt around my neck and trying to end it all, but I'm too much of a bitch when it comes to pain and I'm scared of what awaits me on the other side, whether it be eternal damnation or my consciousness ceasing to exist. I just need someone to help stop me from abusing myself.

text:
Someone in my life once told me that talking about my suicidal thoughts meant I would never do it. That I wasn't serious. That I just wanted to put my problems on other people. That's not true. 

I've talked about them recently because it's what they say I should do. They say to let people in. To talk. I've made a plan and I have to get it out of my head so I'm posting here. 

I've been oddly ok with dying for a very long time. More recently I've felt myself becoming more active in achieving that. I attempted suicide a few months ago. I failed due to family intervention. 

This time though, I've made a plan. I have a month to write my letters, get my financial things in order, and cover any loose ends. I've given myself a month to try and give the people in my life some good memories of me. I also want more good memories of them to carry with me. Once the month is up I plan to commit suicide. 

I want to be away from home so my family doesn't associate loved places with my death. I know how and I know it'll work. It would have last time had I not been found. I feel like this huge weight has lifted from me. I'm more at ease than I've been in years knowing I have a plan. 

I obviously can't talk about it with my family or friends. I've just felt such relief that I needed to get it out and 'say' it.

text:
I'm not feeling too good today, these last few weeks haven't been the best and it's all starting to hit at once. I lost my grandma, an uncle, a few girlfriends, a really important scholarship, the emotional intimacy I used to have with my current girlfriend, and I might lose my best friend to surgery complications soon.

I think at this point the only thing keeping me from suicide is practicality. I don't want to shoot myself in the head because I don't want my mom to have to see that. I could shoot myself in the chest and hope that I hit my heart, but my shotgun is too long for me to be able to pull the trigger at that angle. 

But I'm digressing, do y'all have any success stories about what happened when you didn't pull the trigger? I don't know what I'm going to do with my life if I don't kill myself, and some inspiration about what to do would be really nice.

text:
I need to tell this story. Because nothing has gone right at any stage and I've gone from feeling on top of things to consistently wanting to throw myself off my balcony in the space of a week. I'm a 31 year old male living by myself in a 1 bedroom apartment in the Melbourne metro area. I work as a team leader for a company, currently working from home due to the pandemic. I'm single. I have a condition called acromegaly which requires daily treatment and incurs a lot of medical costs.

Over the last 4 months my workplace has been cutting costs and shedding any jobs they can in order to counter the lack of referrals we've had since la corona kicked off. In this timeframe my workload has tripled. I've gone from looking after a single team of 6 people to managing 20 people across 2 teams and having to liaise with key stake holders far more than I am comfortable. This sort of work is not in my wheelhouse and I've not been comfortable with it. Not that I've had a choice.

This Monday just gone, I had a meeting with my new boss (reporting to her for around 8 days at this stage) and she has casually lumped me with a handful of tasks that I don't know how to get down while juggling my existing workload and meeting all the existing targets I have and I...broke down. I lost my cool, on the verge of tears talking about how this workload is draining me and how this isn't the sort of work I signed up to do. Then it was over and I moved on to my next meeting and continued with my work, miserable but able to continue working. I then get a Zoom call from my boss again and a rep from HR. I attempt to play it off, giving her an update on everything that I've got done in the 45 minutes since we last spoke to no avail.

They advise me to take the rest of the day and Tuesday off because they're "worried about me". I attempt to fight this because a day and a half off isn't going to help me when my workload will be waiting for me when I get back and I really don't want to lose time. I'm told I have no choice as my boss's boss is now involved and they "want to make sure I'm alright". I'm not happy about this but again I have no choice. So I log off and...try to do anything else. Unsuccessfully. I went from being mildly anxious and stressed to full blown depressed in the space of 10 minutes. I spent most of that day and a half sleeping.

Wednesday rolls around and I log on to start my day. I get a call from the HR rep who tells me that I can't come back to work until I've got medical clearance to return. She tells me that our EAP (employee assistance program) or a GP can provide this document. I'm not even remotely happy about this so I channel my inner Karen and email my boss's boss and the HR manager with my concerns in a well written request to have this overturned. It was denied...6 hours later. Boss's boss says that they'll keep my on paid leave until Monday but I need a letter clearing me to return before I can come back. In this time frame I have contacted EAP (twice) and contacted my GP, neither of whom are able to write this letter. My GP gives me a psych referral claiming that they might be able to write said letter. I start looking for psych appointments at short term notice and decide to try my hand with EAP again.

The person I get through to indicates initially that they may be able to help. I talk with them for 20 minutes before bringing up the letter again, to which they advise that they can't provide me something like this. I'm frustrated here, yell something alone the lines of "What's the point of any of this then?!" and hang up. After this I'm feeling lost. I go to the local shopping centre to visit the pharmacy to get some prescriptions filled. I get food on the way home. I get home, sit down and I'm about to eat my food when I get a call on the intercomm. 

It's the Police. EAP called in a welfare check. I politely tell them to piss off and indicate I wont let them into the building. This happened once before (an ex-girlfriend being a possessive pain in the ass) during which when I opened the door a crack to tell them to go away, the shoved their foot in the door and shoved a gas dispenser in my face looking to subdue me. They then forced their way inside. I'm not letting that happen again. 15 minutes after I've told them to go away, they knock on the door having got inside the apartment complex. I again tell them to piss off and refuse to open the door. After some back and forth they offer to have an emergency psych consultant call me to chat. I agree to this hoping this might help me get my letter. No call ever came through. This is still Wednesday.

Thursday rolls around and with no call from whoever the Police said would call, I'm left still looking for a psych appointment. I'm about to give up when at around 2pm, I land a telephone appointment for 7pm that day. I book it in and I finally relax a little hoping that this will finally get me the documentation needed by Monday. 7pm rolls around. Then 7:15. I call the reception for this place, voicemail. I send an email. Nothing. 8pm. I give up. Disheartened once again. Deflated. Dejected. Helpless. I got to sleep.

Friday. 8:30am. I get a call from the receptionist for the company that stood me up. They offer to rebook me for 1pm. I'm elated. Energetic again. I accept. I get a follow up call from the psych apologising for the previous night blaming a scheduling issue. 1pm appointment confirmed. I get up, slightly revitalised. I eat some food and have a shower, suddenly aware it's been a while since I'd done both. I relax and enjoy myself for a few hours until the appointment.

1pm. Got the Zoom invite and jump on a call with the psych. Explain the circumstances and what I need assuming she will then ask me some questions to get an idea about me. I volunteer as much information as I can and explain the outburst as a result of my workload and how work is concerned for my safety. She...doesn't believe that's why work requested said document. She talks about how my manager must have felt threatened by my actions and talked about how I can't go around threatening people in the workplace. She then talks about how my appearance itself must be very threatening and how I should do something to mitigate that by trimming my beard and tying my hair back (I'm a big guy with wild curly hair and a quarantine beard currently). I follow along with what she's saying and try to point out that the outburst was directed inward at myself rather than outward at another person. She doesn't believe me. I express my concerns about the fact that she's not really listening to what I'm saying and rather just pushing what she believes happened. She then says that if we can't communicate then we should end the session now, tells me she wont be charging me and moves to wrap things up. This was at the tail end of a half hour conversation. I try to talk her down citing that I'm not saying these things to disagree with her but because it's important to have a meaningful back and forth and that I was worried she was getting the wrong idea about me. She doesn't care. The session ends. I break down in tears. I go to sleep.

Friday evening. 9:30pm. I don't know what to do. I don't know where I stand or if I'll even have a job on Monday. I can't believe this cancerous week I've had and I'm terrified of what the future holds. With my health issues, I can't afford to be unemployed right now. This genuinely scares me. There's no way I'll be able to enjoy my weekend. I can't eat, I can't enjoy myself. I'm convinced work has done this because they want to get rid of me. I'm so tired of this. I'm tired of everything. I don't want to keep on struggling against the world when the world is clearly telling me I'm not meant to exist. I'm not meant to have a life or stability. I don't know why any of this happened. None of this is fair and I'm mortally tired. I genuinely want to jump. To be free of all of this pressure. To be free of everything. This life has been cruel, unjust and unkind to me.

text:
The title says it all. For nearly eight years now I‚Äôve been struggling with thoughts of killing myself. I‚Äôve called helplines, been to counsellors, psychiatrists and medicated but it all just ends up the same every time.
 Everything hurts so much and I just want to be alone. I can‚Äôt stand being around people, even my two closest friends are becoming too much for me to handle. 
I can never get the thoughts in my head to go away. Vivid imagery of me harming myself, or my lifeless body hanging from something are just becoming too much for me. I‚Äôm worried one of these days I‚Äôm going to impulsively kill myself. 
I want to self harm. I miss the familiar sting of the blade slicing my skin open.
Tomorrow my girlfriend invited me to come swimming in her aunts pool. Right now, that‚Äôs the only thing stopping me from playing butcher with my body. I don‚Äôt want them to see, and be ashamed or feel bad for me. 
I often wish I could just go about my daily life, not plagued with these thoughts clogging up my brain. That I could fall asleep happily, instead of staring at my blank wall and reminiscing about all the things that I‚Äôve done while my nails dig into the thin blanket over my body. The body I don‚Äôt want. The body that I wished nobody could see, not even me. The body that I want to get rid of so badly that I fantasize about all the ways I could die.

text: I cut. a lot. Its gotten worse over the months, probably started in early February when quarantine hit Utah and schools became online. i never was much of a talker, i have a few friends here and there but not many. i don't do dating, my mental heath wasn't great to begin with so i didn't want to get rejected because i was the quiet kid. I was fine before the panic of COVID-19 started, and a couple weeks after it started i got depressed. Like i said, I wasn't social, so what was the problem? my theory is a lot of shit happening in two weeks that pushed me over the edge. My father isn't the nicest, not abusve, physically, but mentally. I didn't have high esteem to born with, I was never told to be proud of what i've done so i wasn't. My dad and my mom got divorced on Christmas, they thought it was a good idea to tell me, my brother, and my sister (both younger than me) after opening out presents and i was 13 thinking, "why wouldn't they tell me first?" but my mom said it was for the best. The next thing was two weeks after Covid was my grandpa died when his heart went out. it didn't really hit me until a week later, when i started cutting. I always loathed going to my fathers because every day i would be yelled at for messing something up. he has this thing where he thinks that if he yells, it get to my head better. it doesn't. he's also a reason why i started cutting. thats all for right now, im tired and just want to sleep, I will edit this if someone really does care to add more

text:
a month ago, I had a plan to kill myself. I went to the local crisis center instead. the people there were kind and all, but they didn't take me seriously.

the counselor I spoke to told me he doesn't think I'm depressed and kept telling me that killing myself would be stupid because it wouldn't solve anything. which I know is technically true, but it felt so dismissive. like he thought I was stupid for feeling the way I did.

we set up a time for him to call the next day and check in, but he said he wouldn't be concerned if I didn't answer. that hurt. I felt like he didn't believe my situation was serious. that or he just didn't care.

before I left, he asked if I still wanted to kill myself. I told him yes. and he just sent me on my way.

he called the next day, and we set up a time for one last check in the following day. but no one ever called. and honestly, that hurt. I'd had a really bad night and was counting on that call. which I guess was stupid on my part. I know it was a free service and I shouldn't complain. I just feel so hurt.

it took everything I had to ask for help. I had never asked for help before. and they wouldn't help me. because I guess I'm not "sick" enough. I go to work every day and I take care of my responsibilities and that means I can't really be depressed or in crisis or deserving of help. I left the center feeling like I had taken resources away from someone who was more deserving.

I'm suffering so much and I want to die and I asked for help but it wasn't enough. that was my only option. my only chance. I don't understand what I did wrong.

text:
Hay 22yo male here ,first post in this sub. 

The last 3yrs been pretty fucked up for me ,even more then the rest of my life before that. I got almost beaten to death by members of a big local family clan.When I just tried to save someone else they wanted to kick to death.The lawsuit against them didnt even go before a court before it was shut  down. 

I now have a giant scar on my head and still half a tooth missing. Also I lost my job back then because of PTSD . 

Two uncles of mine died in january and my mother succumbed to her cancer after 3years of fighting.I am currently without work and hadn't much luck finding a new job.Also I am living with a friend of mine ,sleeping on his couch ,crammed between all my stuff in boxes. 

I am burned out ,I dont even wish to talk to anyone anymore ,lost many friends over the last years ,some through their drug habbits ,others through my social anxiety. 

I feel fucking burned out. Like I wont kill myself as that would make life only harder for my family. But fuck do I think about ending it alot. 

Yeah ...I just wanted to vent .. thanks for reading.
